name.en: I Need Holy Water to Ward Off Evil Spirits!
name.ja: <ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>除<rt>よ</rt></ruby>けの<ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>水<rt>すい</rt></ruby>が<ruby>欲<rt>ほ</rt></ruby>しいです！
name.ja_romaji: Mayoke no Seisui ga Hoshī desu!

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Sparkhearts Passion Girl" or "Sparkhearts Passion Anesh" by sending face-up FIRE Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard as material whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the monster you Ritual Summon (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material). Then, you can destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower Fiend or Warrior Type monster on your opponent's field.
